short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merge windows and sort tabs for easy organization

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and lightweight utility to help you organize your tabs!

Press 'MERGE' to merge tabs from different windows into a single window, and press 'SORT' to group and alphabetize your tabs. Grouping supports easy deletion of duplicate tabs with standard selection and deletion shortcuts.
